thread.title: Trump Faces Test on Coal With FirstEnergy Appeal

author: Timothy Puko
title: Trump Faces Test on Coal With FirstEnergy Appeal
text:
The Trump administration’s commitment to coal is under its stiffest test yet after an Ohio energy company made a plea to favor that power source over its many rivals, including oil and natural gas, in a clash that could end with higher costs for consumers.
FirstEnergy Corp.’s fleet of coal- and nuclear-power plants filed for bankruptcy over the weekend, just days after the company asked the federal government for an emergency declaration that would keep many of them open. That forces President Donald Trump’s Energy Department... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
